reviewText: It has some great Christmas movies.  I haven't had a chance to watch all of them yet, but I will.

I've been looking to purchase The Christmas Box for a while now.  Found it in this collection allong with some other great titles.  Family friendly and wholesome!  They are sure to get you and your family in the Christmas spirit.
Great option for clean holiday movies for the whole family - wonderful gift for that parent, grandparent, etc. to share family time together.
Wonderful, heart warming, movies that make you cry, laugh, and remember how special the Christmas Season really is. The value is wonderful and the convenience of the 10-pack is appreciated.

This holiday movie pack and a can of popcorn was included as one of the "pre-Christmas" gifts I give to the grandkids each year.  They have reported that the family movie pack has been great fun.  (Of course, the popcorn was gone with the first movie!)

I love the movies in this pack.....beautiful Christmas movies filled with love & magic and wonderful messages of hope....watching these movies will make your heart want to sing and dance .....and be merry  :). :)

This is a great inspiring set.

It is hard to frown while watching these movies. They are all such beautiful uplifting stories that it is hard to turn them down.

The movies aren't all of the same quality but they are all enjoyable. Christmas shoes is clearly the headliner here. While some are t as good as others you will still enjoy each of these.

This is great as a gift. I also feel that while faith is strong in these DVDs there isn't an overwhelming preachiness to them. I say this so maybe you would feelore comfortable giving this as a gift. Each movie is heartwarming and has a beautiful message.

This set of films should be loved by all.
These are the usual sappy Christmas movies that I will watch over and over again - even when it's not Christmas!
this is a Christmas present. I have seen 7 of the films and all hit where that little 'Christmas wish list place' is in one's heart. It can be viewed year round to keep that feeling warm and snuggy.
Wonderful collection. The Christmas Box is our favorite.
My grandpa loves watching hallmark movies so I got him this as a Christmas gift. He loved it and couldn't wait to watch it.
A good price for Christmas films
love these movies
Good movies the entire family can watch
She loved it!!!
Great DVD
Loved the movies. I shared them with my sister for a movie afternoon. They touched several emotions.
10 great movies to enjoy over the holidays for the whole family! You won't be disappointed, Very inspirational and well worth the price for sure!  Alot of meaning in each movie.
sorry but the first 3 may end merry but do pull tears --- I prefer CHEERY Christmas, even FUNNY movies - life is sad enough
Nice movie set. We have not watch all of them yet but have watched multiple movies and they were of solid quality. Not likely high definition but great deal for the price!
Dud
Great variety of movies.  Love them all.
I was just looking for The Christmas Box and found it included here with a bunch of other great family Christmas movies. Very happy with this!
Love them!
Awesome!!!!
This is a great package of inspirational Christ made movies. I love the Christmas Shoes & the sequels & the others ones too.
liked the variety
My mom liked almost all the movies on this set!

All I can really say is perfect.

I originally bought this movie collection because my mother and I love the movie "The Christmas Shoes" and we missed it on television this year. I looked up the movie and found this collection and decided to try it out. I had never seen any of the others movies... well... one is better than the next. This is a perfect movie collection for mother/daughter movie nights.

As for the quality of the movies, I never had an issue.
I constantly watch them over and over again and they still play perfectly. Just like any other DVD you have to take care of the discs.

I do not have one complaint about this movie collection and have owned it for almost 3 years now and still love watching every movie each time.

100% recommend.
Brought this as a gift for my mom, she love good Christmas movies.
I love holiday movies and this is a nice collection.
I love this DVD. The movies are great. Some may feel they are too sentimental but for me, Christmas is a sentimental time.
Great, Uplifting family videos!
I loved these movies
Great movie pack, more that half are favorites, I will watch them year round. Recieved the package in maybe four days. great deal
Must see the three Christmas shoes movies, if you have never seen them. Theses movies can be watched all year, not just at Christmas.
I was absolutely thrilled with this DVD. It has 10 great Christmas/Holiday movies on it. The Christmas Box is one of my all-time favorites and it is very hard to find on DVD. Thank you so much!.
My mom has searched everywhere for 'the Christmas box' finally found it with this set.
Thanks!
The 10 Movie Faith & Family Holiday Pack was really good. I watched one every night!
Love it
Christmas Shoes brought back so many memories. Loved the movies!!!!
BUY IT!!!
Great movies!!! These are a must see!!!
We need closed caption not provided.  Picture is poor quality.
Great combination

Amazing collection for an amazing price! All have such wonderful & inspiring messages that fill you with joy & hope for the holiday season. But it is also great to watch all year round. My favorite happens to be 'The Christmas Choir'. A must for the holiday season or for anytime you & your family wish to lift up your spirits, enjoying such wonderful movies!
We enjoy the format of having the ten movies combined into one set.
Enjoyed ALL the movies in this pack... If you are a Christmas movie sap like me... it is worth the investment
great movie set
good job thanks
Great value. My mom and I love to watch these movies while we make Christmas cookies.
great price, love those Hallmark movies
I enjoyed every one.
Great, several of the movies was worth watching....
wonderful!!
Watch these all year long.
got for a friend from work
Didn't like all the show's but it is ok.
My grandchildren have enjoyed many of these movies and so have my husband and I.
Viewing wise, fair to middling consistency, sound, and color.and definition.
my wife loves hallmark movies
Terrific array of holiday movies. Super-fast delivery.
I bought this to watch 2 movies it was well packed and I would buy it again for those same 2 movies the rest were good too!
Gave  this set as a gift and the reviews have been all good
Love these movies!
Picks too sad for Christmas
great for the holidays
Very happy with my order.
Just the movies I wanted and some extras I have not seen.  Have not watch all of them but will next Christmas.
Very happy with this ...
We always enjoy Christmas movies!  These were good ones.
I love my Christmas movies on Hallmark and now I have them to watch all year long.
great
My wife loves them.
Sit back and enjoy holiday feel-good movies.  Great value pack for hours of viewing enjoyment.
Ok I have Christmas movie fest into January. This just added to my collection.
Highly recommend for great holiday movies with the family, especially elementary-aged and middle school-aged kids.
Great, Great movies all in one!
Wonderful movies!
Christmas present; recipient is very happy.
My husband and I are still watching for the 3rd and 4th time, even though it isn't Christmas!
All these movies are great and 10 movies for the price great also.

I purchased these AFTER Christmas, so I haven't watched them yet. I am hopeful that they will be a good set!! Over Christmas, a friend had loaned me "The Christmas Shoes" as a single movie and this is why I looked for and purchased this!! I see NO reason not to give the collection 5 stars!!
Love these large packs of movies. A+ seller, thanks
It was a popular white elephant gift at the Choir Party at church!
This box contains some of my most favorite movies and having the others are a bonus.  Looking forward to watching each.  My reason for buying was The Christmas Box, but saw others I want to see.

Nice holiday movies... family friendly and heartwarming.
I don't buy cable or any kind of television service, so this holiday movie 10-pack gives me the ability to enjoy a holiday treat for 10 days. I'd missed that for many years, and THIS Christmas Season, I was able to enjoy the fun again. I love the wholesomeness of this holiday movie pack! I love that family values are encouraged in the setting of Christmas. Wonderful and Magical. So happy to feel my holiday movie tank finally filled again after more than 20 years of no TV.
Had  a "bad spot" on one of the movies - was not happy but the rest of the movies were fine so we kept the DVD. Came before time.

Good movies nice price so far watched the Christmas Visitor and loved it.  We have seen many of the movies already but I don't mind watching them again. Just not into violent movies this DVD has great options and I love Christmas movies.
I picked this set to have on hand for next Christmas.
got it thanks
as expected
great mix of movies
If you like to watch Christmas movies around the holidays, I recommend this pack.  It has a pretty decent selection of movies.
Love the movies Thank you
My husband and I have enjoyed all of the Spiritual Christmas DVD's.
Hallmark movies are great, this was a gift for my mother in law and she loved it.
Arrived on time ..Moves are as described..Great Price!.Bought them as a gift for my mom she loved them...Would buy from this seller again ...
Grandmothe wanted one of these movies on this dvd but loved them all.  So much in fact that I ended up buying two more.  One for aunt and one for mother in law.  They all love them.
Great gift got mom!
A really nice collection of Holiday Romance movies. Very good quality.  I enjoyed every moment. Thanks.
Quality and price exceptional and great movies!
Wonderful.
the best
I do not think I have watched all of these movies at home yet, but have seen them on tv, which is why I bought them.
great price
Wonderful movies. I would recommend this movie pack 100%.
This is great movie!
last nite i watched Christmas Box and Christmas Vistor both great TV movies, great color very happy that now i have them in my movie collection. It was a great investment worth every dollar.
great movies and a great price

I enjoy watching holiday movies during the year.
They bring me back to my early age. My Mom would bake all kinds of pies and cakes. Both of my parents have passed and I miss them so much.
Good
good
The collection of movies is great. I am a fanatic of Christmas movies. I love it.
Nice to have in my library.
what a treat to watch thoughtful people helping each other to find happiness . adding the Christmas additive was great you won't be disappointed
As Advertised & Shipped Quickly

I enjoyed the movies in this 10-pack,each movie has a great lesson to be learned. Don't take life for granted,it can be gone in a moment. Great casting for all the parts in the movies. This is a great DVD for your collection.
This DVD is great for anyone that loves Christmas movies. Many of the best.
What better way to get GREAT Christmas movies for a great price!
great movies.

Great selection of movies for Christmas, or even year around viewing.  It was worth it to me, just to be able to have "The Box" because I have not been able to find it anywhere for a reasonable price.  Very happy with this purchase!
i'm always looking for good holiday movies which for me begin right after Halloween! There's plenty to choose from in this selection!
This is such a nice collection of holiday movies all on one DVD.  Christmas is my favorite time of the year and I enjoy watching all the holiday movies.
I LIKE TO WATCH SENTIMENTAL CHRISTMAS MOVIES WHILE WRAPPING PACKAGES, BAKING CHRISTMAS COOKIES AND WRITING CHRISTMAS CARDS. THESE MOVIES PUT ME IN THE CHRISTMAS SPIRIT.
I really was happy to get this collection of some of my favorite movies on one disc. Received promptly and in excellent condition.
Wonderful family Christmas movies and fun to watch  around the holidays....lots of sentimental  feelings about the holidays.....sometimes the tears just flow.....
This is a very nice collection of Christmas movies. They are very nice human interest stories about people celebrating the Christmas season. I loved the collection.
I like it because there  r a lot of deferent movies to watch and its family friendly. thankyou so much

It's nice to have movies that inspire and make you feel good!  My family sincerely enjoyed these movies.  Cheesy?  Of course they are! But that's what makes them enjoyable for hopeless romantics and folks who need happy endings.  We saw several of these stories on Hallmark - they were edited for TV - some of these have a few extra scenes not seen on TV.  Think of them as extended versions..  but not that much - so don't get too excited  :)

Want stories that touch your heart?  These are great movies for kids and parents of all ages!  Watching these, one can see that there is a God, family is important, and friends can be just as important as family..
Very family oriented . Great  films for all ages. We should all sit down with our families and friends  for wholesome entertainment.

Wonderful value for 10 moves. As with the other "Holiday Romance Pack" of movies the same problems do appear. Pixilation and some blurriness and no "play all" feature (goes to menu after each movie).  Still, it's well worth the money and I am very happy to have this set. I wish they would put ALL their movies into these 10 packs!!!
Greatest collection of Christmas movies that we have ever seen ! We loved seeing them all! Lots of movies  for a very good prices and wonderful messages!
Received the wrong set of movies. Not the set I ordered. Frustrated and wanted to watch with family.  Not interested in any of movies on set received.

There are 3-4 one and a half hours movies on each of the 3 DVDs. The compression made the movies horrible to watch for a videophile, but if you just wanted to see the stories, it was good enough. Will probably only watch once a year anyway.

Summary: Don't expect even DVD quality picture.

I had cable turned off because of the cost and found that each month I could have the dvd's instead. The movies are all wonderful and the plus is no commericals. No sorry I dumped the cable and am thrilled I can still watch the movies I have loved over the years.

I was dissapointed by this pack and I would have sent it back if I could have.  Yes- these movies have a Christian theme, which is what I was looking for, BUT we only watched the first 3 and they are depressing.  Why do we have to kill off mothers and fathers in christmas movies?  That is just unnecessary!  Can't we make Christian films where our parents don't die? In truth, there are important Christian lessons to be learned in these movies. And the acting is very professional.  I just don't like the way these movies made me feel. They did not inspire me to pursue a deeper Christian purpose.
The best Christmas movies.  I would recommend this for every family.  I am ordering one for my daughters and their families to be watched every season.  ++++THE BEST!!!
I purchased this set of movies for a friend for Christmas. They loved it. The order came timely, and was in perfect shape!
These are all classics and all I could only watch a few of them over the holidays, it left me wanting to watch more next year. Love the Christmas movies
How refreshing to watch movies where the people actually have integrity and ethics. I expected there'd be some not-so-great movies in this collection but all of them are worth watching again.

This movie bundle is a great choice for family entertainment.

Very good value and a solid Christmas gift for anyone.

If you are looking for violence and things that will drag you down and depress you, don't buy these movies.  If you are looking for movies that are uplifting with decent morals and that will make you feel good, buy these.  They are all super.  The entire family would enjoy them.

I liked most of the stories and felt it was worth my purchase.  It's got a variety which I like on a dvd - always like the multi packs of movies.
I would recommend it without hesitation.
10 movies for almost the price of one or two videos----great quality and inspiration for the holiday season; we are looking forward to this pack of movies being part of our holiday traditions

I bought it for my wife, she likes The Christmas Shoes, The Christmas Blessing, and The Christmas Hope.
The Christmas Shoes was her favorite and makes her cry everytime she watches it.  Watched them all and
the rest of the movies were just as good as the first three.

I bought this collection mainly because I was looking for A Christmas Visitor (with William DeVane and Meredith Baxter) but purchasing this DVD by itself was a little pricey.  However, it's in this collection, along with The Christmas Hope, another tear-jerker.  Unfortunately Christmas is past now, so I'll watch the other movies next Christmas season.  I've seen all or part of most of these movies on the Hallmark Channel - all good 'family' movies.  But I watched A Christmas Visitor on TV every chance I got, until I purchased this collection.  One word of caution when you watch this one:  at the very end of the movie, make sure you have several tissues nearby - it's hard not to keep tears running down your face.  A wonderful and truly inspirational ending to an outstanding storyline - one of Hallmark's best Christmas movies.  Christmas Hope is another 'sad' movie with an uplifting and happy ending.  This collection is worth buying.

This movie pack is a great bargain. I originally purchased it for "The Christmas Box" which is impossible to find by itself (at a reasonable price). The other movies are a great bonus! I am glad I made this purchase. I actually ordered another one for a gift. Fast shipping as well.
We loved the safe, family, Christian messages and the moral direction of each movie.  Many of the stories were unique, a nice surprise.
Only buy this if you want to cry or be somewhat bored. I've watched six of the movies so far and I already feel like I probably will never watch them again. Waste of my money, unfortunately.
Every movie in this 10 pack DVD is very good. One can relax in an easy chair and enjoy the movies.
Very good old fashioned Christmas themed movies done the way they should always be with love and respect for the Bible and the Lord!

My family and I loved these movies. We will treasure them as our favorite Christmas movies and they are so good that we will want to watch them all year round. Make sure you have a box of tissues nearby.

Wonderful movies with excellent values and virtues. My teenagers and I enjoyed each movie. I do wish the set included Timepiece, but we were very happy with each movie and will watch them year after year.
Good clean heartwarming movies for Christmas! These are great for the entire family to watch & all of them are good.

I have enjoyed this holiday movie pack.  People tend to get away from the true meaning of the season.  You will be able to watch
and rewatch your favorites

Beautiful and inspirational stories.  Absolutely loved by all who viewed them. Always a fan of Hallmark Movies. Can never
go wrong with them.  M.S.
my family enjoy these Christmas  movies anytime of the year
a great Christmas selection!!
What a great DVD of all these Christmas favorites. A great collection of Christmas movies that all will enjoy.
Very good movies!!
Great selection of movies for a good price!
Some of the movies were very hard to hear even though I had the volume turned up very high. But my favorite one, A Christmas Visitor  the sound was just fine on it.
great
product was as shown.
arrived in great condition and the movies are all Great!!!  This price can't be beat!!!
Excellent. Movies didn't seem sped up at first. Watching more of them some were sped up. They do not look natural when the running time is compressed.
